column1: Baby Barnaby's////The staff here is so friendly and welcoming. I swear it makes the food taste even better. I enjoyed a delicious plate of the green eggs that were nicely seasoned and fluffier than I imagined. I was also happy with their potatoes
column2: which were crispy and reminiscent of tater tots. I left feeling very full! Even on a Monday at 11 am there was a wait
column3: but there is a bench area to have a seat. The menu isn't terribly long
column4: but has a number of appealing choices including low carb / low fat. It's nice that if you order coffee they give you a carafe
column5: but are also excellent about checking to see if you need more. Overall a very cozy and nice place to eat breakfast.
